factors.exposureDescription: indicates the portfolio's sensitivity to various market factors.
factors.positiveExposure: Positive exposure (green) means the portfolio may gain positive returns when the factor performs well.
factors.negativeExposure: Negative exposure (red) means the portfolio may gain negative returns when the factor performs well.
factors.adjustedExposureDescription: Exposure values are adjusted to account for factor correlations. Dashed lines show raw exposures before adjustment.
factors.correlationDescription: Factors can be correlated with each other, affecting the overall portfolio risk. Green indicates positive correlation, red indicates negative correlation.
factors.riskContributionDescription: Shows the percentage contribution of each factor to the overall portfolio risk, considering both exposure magnitude and factor correlations.
